languages.text: {n}Арджента с нескрываемой печалью смотрит на девочку, тихо бормочет молитву и стискивает оружие до белых костяшек.{/n}
{n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента с нескрываемой печалью смотрит на девочку, тихо бормочет молитву и стискивает оружие до белых костяшек.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with unconcealable sadness, whispers a silent prayer, and clenches her weapon so hard the knuckles turn white.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta mira a la muchacha con evidente tristeza. Murmura una plegaria en silencio y sujeta su arma con tanta fuerza que los nudillos de su mano palidecen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta mira a la muchacha con evidente tristeza. Murmura una plegaria en silencio y sujeta su arma con tanta fuerza que los nudillos de su mano palidecen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは、分かりやすく悲しげに少女を見つめる。彼女は静かに祈りを囁き、指の関節が白くなるほど強く武器を握りしめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは、分かりやすく悲しげに少女を見つめる。彼女は静かに祈りを囁き、指の関節が白くなるほど強く武器を握りしめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔看着女孩，脸上带着明显的悲伤之意。她低声默默祈祷，随后紧紧握住了武器，指节都握得发白了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔看着女孩，脸上带着明显的悲伤之意。她低声默默祈祷，随后紧紧握住了武器，指节都握得发白了。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta blickt das Mädchen mit offenkundiger Trauer an. Sie flüstert ein stilles Gebet und umklammert dann den Griff ihre Waffe so fest, dass ihre Knöchel sich weiß färben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta blickt das Mädchen mit offenkundiger Trauer an. Sie flüstert ein stilles Gebet und umklammert dann den Griff ihre Waffe so fest, dass ihre Knöchel sich weiß färben.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta regarde la jeune fille sans parvenir à dissimuler sa tristesse. Elle murmure une prière silencieuse en serrant son arme si fort que ses jointures deviennent blanches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta regarde la jeune fille sans parvenir à dissimuler sa tristesse. Elle murmure une prière silencieuse en serrant son arme si fort que ses jointures deviennent blanches.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, kıza gözle görülür bir hüzünle bakıyor. Sessiz bir dua okuyor, ardından silahını o kadar güçlü kavrıyor ki parmak eklemleri bembeyaz oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at the girl with visible sadness. She whispers a silent prayer, then clenches her weapon so hard that the knuckles on her hand turn white.{/n}
